queue.name: VPS Connection Wired to Wrong Components
queue.description: Terminal and file explorer are wired to the WRONG UI components. They appear inside the Servers tab card instead of the proper locations.
user_flow: A: Open Workspace > Servers tab shows 'No VPS Linked' > Click 'Link a Server'
B: Dropdown shows Digital Ocean server > Select it
C: Server card appears with 'CONNECTED VPS' label and 'Connect' button
D: Click Connect > Terminal/folder icons appear IN THE SERVER CARD (WRONG!)
whats_broken: TOP BAR: Still shows 'VPS: Loading...' and 'Disconnected' - never updates to connected state
TERMINAL TAB: In LLM-Dev panel, still shows 'Connecting...' forever - never gets the terminal
FILE EXPLORER: Icons appear in server card, but should populate the left sidebar Explorer
SERVERS TAB: Has embedded terminal/files - this should just be for server management, not the actual terminal
expected_behavior: Top bar should update: 'VPS: Loading...' → 'VPS: Connected' or show the IP
Terminal TAB in LLM-Dev panel should show actual bash prompt from DO server
File Explorer in LEFT SIDEBAR should show files from the connected server
Servers tab should only manage connections, not embed the terminal
queue.root_cause: When Connect is clicked, the terminal/file WebSocket connections are being passed to the Servers tab component instead of the Terminal tab and Explorer sidebar
files_to_check: Servers tab component - where is it creating terminal? Should NOT be here
Terminal tab component - why isn't it receiving the connection?
Workspace state management - how does VPS connection state propagate?
Top bar VPS status - why doesn't it update?
queue.test: After connecting VPS: top bar shows 'Connected', Terminal TAB shows bash prompt, Explorer sidebar shows server files
